CPU: Apple M1
OS: macOS
Date (UTC): 2025-12-31 00:00:00 UTC+0000
------------------------

╔════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗
║     Sparse Ternary FMA Kernel - Comprehensive Benchmark       ║
║                                                                ║
║  Implementation: Scalar (Reference)
║  AVX-512 Support: No
╚════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
CORRECTNESS TESTS
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

Test 1: Encode/Decode Correctness
----------------------------------
  -1 → 0x02 → -1 [PASS]
   0 → 0x00 →  0 [PASS]
   1 → 0x01 →  1 [PASS]

Test 2: Pack/Unpack Correctness
--------------------------------
  Array size: 1024 trits
  Packed size: 256 bytes (25.0% of original)
  Errors: 0
  Result: [PASS]

Test 3: Ternary Multiply Correctness
-------------------------------------
  12345 × -1 = -12345 (expected -12345) [PASS]
  12345 ×  0 = 0 (expected 0) [PASS]
  12345 ×  1 = 12345 (expected 12345) [PASS]

Test 4: Sparse Ternary FMA Correctness
---------------------------------------
  Array size: 256
  Errors: 0
  Result: [PASS]

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
PERFORMANCE BENCHMARKS
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

Benchmark 1: Encoding Overhead
-------------------------------
  Array size: 512 trits
  Iterations: 100000
  Pack time: 45.581 ms (0.456 μs/op)
  Unpack time: 53.846 ms (0.538 μs/op)

Benchmark 2: Density Gain Validation
-------------------------------------
  Array size: 512
  Iterations: 10000
  8-bit encoding: 4.130 ms (0.413 μs/op)
  2-bit encoding: 4.763 ms (0.476 μs/op)
  Speedup: 0.87×
  Memory saved: 384 bytes (75.0%)

Benchmark 3: SIMD Throughput
-----------------------------
  Array size: 512
  Iterations: 10000
  Scalar: 4.630 ms (0.463 μs/op)
  SIMD: 4.612 ms (0.461 μs/op)
  Speedup: 1.00×
  Throughput (scalar): 1105.8 Mtrits/s
  Throughput (SIMD): 1110.1 Mtrits/s

Benchmark 4: Sparse Optimization
---------------------------------
  Array size: 512
  Hamming weight: 128 (25.0%)
  Iterations: 10000
  Dense: 3.022 ms (0.302 μs/op)
  Sparse: 0.639 ms (0.064 μs/op)
  Speedup: 4.73× (theoretical: 4.0×)

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
SUMMARY
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

✓ All correctness tests PASSED
✓ Performance benchmarks completed successfully
✓ Kernel is ready for production use
